mapper.select: SELECT SIGNON.USERID, ACCOUNT.EMAIL, ACCOUNT.STATUS, ACCOUNT.ADDRESS AS address, ACCOUNT.STATE, ACCOUNT.PHONE, PROFILE.LANGPREF AS languagePreference, PROFILE.FAVCATEGORY AS favouriteCategoryId, PROFILE.MYLISTOPT AS listOption, PROFILE.BANNEROPT AS bannerOption, BANNERDATA.BANNERNAME FROM ACCOUNT, PROFILE, SIGNON, BANNERDATA WHERE ACCOUNT.USERID = #{userId} AND SIGNON.USERID = ACCOUNT.USERID AND PROFILE.USERID = ACCOUNT.USERID AND PROFILE.FAVCATEGORY = BANNERDATA.FAVCATEGORY

SELECT SIGNON.USERID, ACCOUNT.EMAIL, ACCOUNT.STATUS, ACCOUNT.ADDRESS AS address, ACCOUNT.STATE, ACCOUNT.PHONE, PROFILE.LANGPREF AS languagePreference, PROFILE.MYLISTOPT AS listOption, PROFILE.BANNEROPT AS bannerOption, BANNERDATA.BANNERNAME FROM ACCOUNT, PROFILE, SIGNON, BANNERDATA WHERE ACCOUNT.USERID = #{param1} AND SIGNON.PASSWORD = #{param2} AND SIGNON.USERNAME = ACCOUNT.USERID AND PROFILE.USERID = ACCOUNT.USERID AND PROFILE.FAVCATEGORY = BANNERDATA.FAVCATEGORY
SELECT USERID AS VALUE FROM SIGNON
mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT SET EMAIL = #{email}, STATUS = #{status}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state}, PHONE = #{phone} WHERE USERID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT (EMAIL,STATUS, ADDRESS,STATE, PHONE, USERID) VALUES (#{email}, #{status}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state}, , #{phone}, #{userId})
INSERT INTO PROFILE (LANGPREF, FAVCATEGORY, USERID) VALUES (#{languagePreference}, #{userId})
mapper.update: UPDATE SIGNON SET PASSWORD = #{password} WHERE USERNAME = #{userId}
